  ✓ Works well at small sizes

================================================================================
CANVA QUICK STEPS
================================================================================

1. Go to canva.com → Create design → 1024 x 1024

2. Background:
   - Elements → Gradients → Blue gradient
   - Or Elements → Shapes → Square → Color #0891B2

3. Main Icon:
   - Elements → Search "calculator icon white" or "percentage icon"
   - Make it large (600-700px)
   - Center it
   - Color: White

4. Accents (optional):
   - Elements → Lines → Draw 3 thin horizontal lines at bottom
   - Colors: green, white, red
   - Reduce opacity to 20%

5. Download:
   - Share → Download → PNG → High quality

6. Verify: Should be exactly 1024x1024 pixels


================================================================================
FINAL CHECKLIST
================================================================================

Before adding to Xcode:
□ File is exactly 1024 x 1024 pixels
□ File format is PNG
□ No transparency (solid background)
□ No rounded corners
□ Icon is recognizable at 60x60 size
□ Looks good on both light and dark backgrounds
□ Represents calculator/tax/finance theme
□ Professional appearance
□ Unique (not generic)

Ready? Add to Xcode:
1. Open Xcode project
2. Go to Assets.xcassets → AppIcon
3. Drag your PNG into the 1024x1024 slot
4. Done! Xcode generates all sizes automatically
